content: Chapter 3 will have you finding secret areas, bringing together NPCs and continuing to take down the Loongs. Here are all the secret bosses you can encounter.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", under the primary heading "Secret Bosses in Chapter 3". The content is presented below:

Chapter 3 will have you finding secret areas, bringing together NPCs and continuing to take down the Loongs. Here are all the secret bosses you can encounter.
